effect.sun_moon: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.

short_effect.sun_moon: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.
